texto: 7.7.2 Benefits Reliability analysis provides a quantitative measure of product and service performance without failures or service interruptions. Reliability analysis is an aid in the containment of risk in system operation. Reliability is an influential factor in the perception of product or service quality, as well as in customer satisfaction.
